Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Hydrogen^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢，现在我终于可以完成这个能量电池了，这些是给你的奖励。
Texts.Eng: Great. Thanks so very much. Now I can complete this power cell! Take this as payment for your deeds.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;水^reset;从来都是供不应求的资源。如果你已经升级了你的^orange;物质枪^reset;中液体采集功能，你就可以采集到成吨的水。现在请顺便从水里萃取一些^orange;氢^reset;，然后将它带给我吧。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Water^reset; is never in short supply. If you have upgraded your ^orange;Matter Manipulator^reset; to pick up liquids...^orange;extract some^reset; and bring me ^orange;5 hydrogen^reset; if you don't mind?
